NK010(tha)035:0: phur pa'i bka' srung gi gsol mchod snying po ni /
NK010(tha)035:2: dpal chen rdo rje gzhon nu yi //
NK010(tha)035:3: bran dang bka' nyan pho nya'i tshogs //
NK010(tha)035:4: sho na bdag nyid sa bdag ma //
NK010(tha)035:5: bse lcags dung gi skyes bu sogs //
NK010(tha)035:6: khyed kyi dam tshig dus la babs //
NK010(tha)035:7: dam rdzas gtor ma 'di bzhes la //
NK010(tha)035:8: sngon chad ji ltar dam bcas bzhin //
NK010(tha)035:9: bcol ba'i phrin las 'grub par mdzod //
NK010(tha)035:10: badz+ra k+ai la ya d+ha rma p+aa la ma h+aa ba ling+ta kh+aa hi /
